sentences.english: Objective To examine the usefulness of keratoplasty with the patients of symblepharon after burns.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察角膜移植治療燒傷後瞼球粘連的效果。

sentences.english: The upper eyelid scar was repaired by concealing it in the supratarsal fold naturally.
sentences.chinese: 修復上瞼瘢痕，使瘢痕自然隱蔽在上瞼皺襞中。

sentences.english: My hair was wet. Droplets were on my face.
sentences.chinese: 我的頭髮溼了，霧滴在我瞼上。

sentences.english: Objective To explore mental health state of patients with blepharospasm and hemifacial spasm.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討瞼肌及面肌痙攣病人有無異常心理健康狀態。

sentences.english: Only a small portion in abnormal Meibomian secretion are related to inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 僅有小部分瞼扳腺分泌物異常和炎症有關。

sentences.english: Mr. Carr had a strange smile on his face.
sentences.chinese: 卡爾先生瞼上露出了怪異的笑。

sentences.english: Coffee intake was also tied to a delay in blepharospasm onset.
sentences.chinese: 攝入咖啡還可以延遲瞼痙攣的發作。

sentences.english: Repeated infection and inflammation lead to scarring of the conjunctiva, which may eventually cause the eyelid to turn inwards.
sentences.chinese: 反覆感染和炎症導致結膜瘢痕，其最終可導致瞼內翻。

sentences.english: Some minor issues Rottweilers are prone to are entropion , ectropion , epilepsy and cataracts .
sentences.chinese: 羅威容易一些小事都瞼，外翻，白內障和癲癇。

sentences.english: K14 was mainly in the epithelial layer of palpebral mucocutaneous junction and palpebral conjunctiva.
sentences.chinese: K14表達在瞼緣皮膚粘膜交界處及瞼結膜上皮細胞。

sentences.english: Entropion and ectropion is certainly seen in the breed.
sentences.chinese: 瞼內翻和外翻是肯定的品種出現在。

sentences.english: Eversion of the eyelid may show a dilated meibomian gland.
sentences.chinese: 將眼瞼翻轉可發現一擴張的瞼板腺。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical effect of the treatment of bleomycin in patients with xanthelasma palpebrarum.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察平陽黴素局部注射治療瞼黃疣的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: The disease progresses over years as repeated infections cause scarring on the inside of the eyelid.
sentences.chinese: 因反覆感染導致瞼內側瘢痕形成，該病進展多年。

sentences.english: Results The surgical treatment can re-duce the degree of blepharospasm .
sentences.chinese: 結果手術能明顯減輕瞼痙攣程度。

sentences.english: Objective: To improve the clinical effect of levator shortening operation through ameliorating the classical adjustable suture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討提上瞼肌縮短調整縫線改良術的手術效果。

definition: to fasten with rivets/(coll.) to exert one's strength
